wikipedia_page.main:
Kieran Treadwell (born 6 November 1995) is an English-born, Irish rugby union player who currently plays in the United Rugby Championship for Ulster. 
He attended The John Fisher School as a pupil. Before joining Irish province Ulster ahead of the 2016–17 Pro12 season, Treadwell played for English side Harlequins, having come through their Academy as a youth.

response: * Kieran Treadwell, Rugby Union, formerly of Harlequins, currently plays for Ulster Rugby and Ireland.
